title: [DGX團隊] 《願榮光歸香港》超激英文版阿!!!! 推上tweeter 929全世界唱阿!!!

replies.msg:
大家期待已久既英文版 (929全球合唱) 唔該推俾外國朋友聽到
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jXZNOecZreY

music: thomas dgx yhl
lyrics: t, 眾連登仔
English lyrics by:
Dr Rubbish Teen, 眾連登仔





詞解:
A1
Pledge: To vow, to promise, 承諾, 宣誓
Wrath: Anger, 憤怒（原文「憤恨」）
Dispel: To remove, to scatter, 消除, 破解（doubts dispell’d取原文「拒默沉」之意）
Ye: You (plural), 你（衆數）
Reign: To rule, 掌權（Freedom reign，讓自由掌權，即自由來臨）

A2
Dread: Great fear, 極度嘅恐懼
On we tread: To keep going forward, 繼續向前邁進
Afield: 遍野
Let blood rage afield: 就算血濺沙場（血在流）
Our voice grows evermore: 但（邁進）聲響透

B
A solitary trumpet flares: 一個孤獨嘅號角響起
to arms: 戴gear保護眾人
Valour: Strength of mind in face of danger, courage, 面對艱難嘅勇氣
Stride: （昂首）闊步

A3
Break now the dawn: 破曉=the dawn breaks, 所以全句就係「黎明來到」
Thee: You (singular), 你（單數）


純樂器版 內有多種可唱翻譯 (日,國語, 台語, etc)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e1Qy-WHErOE

原版&march版已上 kkbox, spotify, apple music, itunes, tidal等等平台
亦已在港台/這台派台 (獅子山封面 , 2019 光復香港唱片公司 , 湯瑪士&眾香港人)
英文版&純樂器版之後都會派上各平台

apple 突然被下架
我懷疑....
我1x日前對盜版既投訴, 話正版會經landr派發
之後我轉左搵hocc幫手, 但apple一直未覆所以冇update佢地
apple琴日先覆我話會盡快處理,
之後今日正版就被下架 可能係佢以為正版係盜版...
處理中


資料總合頁(最新資料,歌詞,各平台連結, 下載LINK etc)
https://sites.google.com/view/glorytohongkong/%E9%A6%96%E9%A0%81





29th Sept, an Open Letter from the team behind "Glory to Hong Kong"

We are a group of Hong Kongers, who also happen to be the team behind the "Glory to Hong Kong" anthem that sprung up recently in the wider Hong Kong political movement.

Those who followed the news will not be strangers to the enduring spirit of perseverance displayed in the last 3 months. Those more observant may have even noticed this for the last 5 years, when Hong Kongers strived ceaselessly for the human rights and dignity that they so well deserve by virtue of both international treaties and natural law.

We know that this struggle will be a long one.
Those who are reading this letter without fear of arrest or retribution can do so precisely because your ancestors fought for the same things we are fighting for now. Blood has been spilt, sacrifices made, and now with the fruit of past labours, you are living in a free and democratic country.
For this, we Hong Kongers know we are not alone in our fight. What is happening now is no anomaly in history. The road we are taking is a well-trodden one.

A single person may not change much,
And a single Hong Kong may indeed be but a tiny speck on the globe,
But every single one of you who make the decision to stand with Hong Kong
Is another indispensable person that fights in this struggle,
This struggle for freedom, this struggle for democracy.

And for this, we Hong Kongers extend our thanks.
For you are fighting not only by us,
You are fighting for freedom, you are fighting for democracy.

Dgx Studio



929公開信:

先生&女士, 我們是一班香港人, 亦是創作這首歌的團隊,
你們一定已經注意到 在過去5年內, 特別是最近三個月,
香港的人民為了爭取與生俱來,並由各國際條約明確賦予的人權與尊嚴,
即使在黑暗既環境下都堅持到底, 絕不放棄

我們知道這是一場持久戰,
正呼吸著自由空氣的各位, 你們的國家可能很多年前已經民主化,
你們的祖先亦為此流過血和犧牲,
所以我地絕不孤獨, 在前人走過的路上亦有你們相伴

一個人的力量也許薄弱,
一個香港在國際上力量也許微不足道,
但每一個決定站在香港一方的人, 也是為了民主自由而必不可缺的抗爭者

衷心感謝你們的支持,
因為你們不單單是與我們並肩作戰
你們是為了自由而戰, 你們是為了民主而戰

Dgx 團隊

好撚正呀

香港反送中運動持續，預計 9.28 和 10.1 都有機會再次爆發大規模衝突；外交部駐港特派員公署副特派員宋如安，就向在港外國傳媒放話，指香港示威者揮舞英國、美國國旗，又破壞立法會和中聯辦，貶損國旗和國徽，還唱歌尋求獨立，有「光復香港、時代革命」等口號，是公然挑戰一國兩制紅線，顯露顏色革命和本土恐怖主義的特徵。

宋如安在中環宴請外國傳媒時發言，指持續百多日的示威，除了要求特首林鄭月娥下台，又破壞立法會和中聯辦等，貶損國旗和國徽，煽動學生組人鏈，反修例歌曲是尋求「香港獨立」，口號亦包括「光復香港、時代革命」，「暴徒」的行為令人震驚不可接受，公然挑戰一國兩制紅線。
絲打好有心機
真係填得好好

music: thomas dgx yhl
lyrics: t, 眾連登仔
English lyrics by:
Dr Rubbish Teen, 眾連登仔





詞解:
A1
Pledge: To vow, to promise, 承諾, 宣誓
Wrath: Anger, 憤怒（原文「憤恨」）
Dispel: To remove, to scatter, 消除, 破解（doubts dispell’d取原文「拒默沉」之意）
Ye: You (plural), 你（衆數）
Reign: To rule, 掌權（Freedom reign，讓自由掌權，即自由來臨）

A2
Dread: Great fear, 極度嘅恐懼
On we tread: To keep going forward, 繼續向前邁進
Afield: 遍野
Let blood rage afield: 就算血濺沙場（血在流）
Our voice grows evermore: 但（邁進）聲響透

B
A solitary trumpet flares: 一個孤獨嘅號角響起
to arms: 戴gear保護眾人
Valour: Strength of mind in face of danger, courage, 面對艱難嘅勇氣
Stride: （昂首）闊步

A3
Break now the dawn: 破曉=the dawn breaks, 所以全句就係「黎明來到」
Thee: You (singular), 你（單數）

英文版&純樂器版之後都會派上各平台

資料總合頁(最新資料,歌詞,各平台連結, 下載LINK etc)
https://sites.google.com/view/glorytohongkong/%E9%A6%96%E9%A0%81





29th Sept, an Open Letter from the team behind "Glory to Hong Kong"

We are a group of Hong Kongers, who also happen to be the team behind the "Glory to Hong Kong" anthem that sprung up recently in the wider Hong Kong political movement.

Those who followed the news will not be strangers to the enduring spirit of perseverance displayed in the last 3 months. Those more observant may have even noticed this for the last 5 years, when Hong Kongers strived ceaselessly for the human rights and dignity that they so well deserve by virtue of both international treaties and natural law.

We know that this struggle will be a long one.
Those who are reading this letter without fear of arrest or retribution can do so precisely because your ancestors fought for the same things we are fighting for now. Blood has been spilt, sacrifices made, and now with the fruit of past labours, you are living in a free and democratic country.
For this, we Hong Kongers know we are not alone in our fight. What is happening now is no anomaly in history. The road we are taking is a well-trodden one.

A single person may not change much,
And a single Hong Kong may indeed be but a tiny speck on the globe,
But every single one of you who make the decision to stand with Hong Kong
Is another indispensable person that fights in this struggle,
This struggle for freedom, this struggle for democracy.

And for this, we Hong Kongers extend our thanks.
For you are fighting not only by us,
You are fighting for freedom, you are fighting for democracy.

Dgx Studio



929公開信:

先生&女士, 我們是一班香港人, 亦是創作這首歌的團隊,
你們一定已經注意到 在過去5年內, 特別是最近三個月,
香港的人民為了爭取與生俱來,並由各國際條約明確賦予的人權與尊嚴,
即使在黑暗既環境下都堅持到底, 絕不放棄

我們知道這是一場持久戰,
正呼吸著自由空氣的各位, 你們的國家可能很多年前已經民主化,
你們的祖先亦為此流過血和犧牲,
所以我地絕不孤獨, 在前人走過的路上亦有你們相伴

一個人的力量也許薄弱,
一個香港在國際上力量也許微不足道,
但每一個決定站在香港一方的人, 也是為了民主自由而必不可缺的抗爭者

衷心感謝你們的支持,
因為你們不單單是與我們並肩作戰
你們是為了自由而戰, 你們是為了民主而戰

Dgx 團隊
